description: Refers to a low-desire attitude towards life: not striving, just getting by, doing the minimum. Similar to the "Satori generation" in Japan. Opposite of "Involution" (Neijuan).

examples.chinese: 今天啥都不想做,躺平比较好
examples.translation: Don't want to do anything today, better to lie flat

examples.chinese: 年轻人不能躺平,一定要努力挑战
examples.translation: Young people shouldn't lie flat, must work hard and challenge

examples.chinese: 在赚钱上内卷,在烂事上躺平
examples.translation: Compete hard in making money, lie flat on rotton things
